title: SAP Sybase ASE - Overview
description: This dashboard provides overview and insights into SAP Sybase ASE Instance. It covers details about its network, server engine, and I/O performance.

definition.content:
## Overview

This dashboard provides overview and insights into SAP Sybase ASE Instance. It covers details about its network, server engine, and I/O performance.

## Widgets
1. Total Bytes Sent 
2. Total Bytes Received 
3. Bytes Activity Overtime 
4. Total Packets Sent 
5. Total Packets Received 
6. Packets Activity Overtime 
7. Network Statistics 
8. Total Transactions 
9. Active Connections 
10. Total Deadlocks Occurred 
11. Engine Statistics 
12. Select Queries Executed 
13. Update Queries Executed 
14. Insert Queries Executed 
15. Delete Queries Executed 
16. Server Statistics 
17. Avg System Percent Busy 
18. Time-Series of System Percent Busy 
19. Avg I/O Percent Busy 
20. Time-Series of I/O Percent Busy 
21. Total Disk Reads per Second 
22. Total Disk Writes per Second 
23. Total Network Reads per Second 
24. Total Network Writes per Second 
25. Server Engine Information 
26. Overall Procedure Cache Used Percentage 
27. Overall Procedure Cache Used Memory 
28. Procedure Cache Used Statistics 
29. Total Reads 
30. Device I/O Statistics 
31. Total Writes 
32. I/O Queue by Type 
33. I/O Queue Statistics 
34. Total Rows Inserted 
35. DB Rows Statistics 
36. Total Rows Updated 
37. Total Rows Deleted 
38. Time-Series of Deadlocks and Total I/O(s) 
39. Deadlocks and Total I/O(s) Information 
40. Total Active Operations 
41. Total Lock Requests 
42. Total Physical Lock Requests 
43. DB Summary 
44. Forecast for Bytes Activity Overtime
45. Forecast for Packets Activity Overtime
44. Forecast for System Percent Busy
45. Forecast for I/O Percent Busy
46. Forecast for Active Connections
47. Forecast for Procedure Cache Used Percentage

definition.title: Time-Series of Deadlocks and Total I/O(s)
Forecast for Procedure Cache Used Percentage
